PERSONA.NAME: Duke Senior
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Living in banishment in the Forest of Arden, brother to Duke Frederick, father to Rosalind

PERSONA.NAME: Duke Frederick
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Brother to Duke Senior and usurper of his dominions, father to Celia

PERSONA.NAME: Amiens
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Lord attending on the banished Duke Senior, a gifted singer.

PERSONA.NAME: Jaques
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A melancholy lord attending on the banished Duke Senior

PERSONA.NAME: Le Beau
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A courtier attending upon Duke Frederick

PERSONA.NAME: Charles
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Wrestler to Duke Frederick

PERSONA.NAME: Oliver
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Oldest son of Sir Rowland de Boys, brother to Orlando

PERSONA.NAME: Orlando
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Youngest son of Sir Rowland de Boys, brother to Oliver

PERSONA.NAME: Jaques de Boys
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Son of Sir Rowland de Boys, protected by brother Oliver.

PERSONA.NAME: Adam
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Servant to Oliver

PERSONA.NAME: Dennis
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Servant to Oliver

PERSONA.NAME: Touchstone
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A clown in the court of Duke Frederick, later marries Audrey.

PERSONA.NAME: Sir Oliver Martext
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A vicar

PERSONA.NAME: Corin
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A shepherd

PERSONA.NAME: Silvius
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A shepherd, in love with Phebe.

PERSONA.NAME: William
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A country fellow in love with Audrey

PERSONA.NAME: Hymen
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A person representing Hymen. The god of marriage.

PERSONA.NAME: Rosalind
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Daughter to the banished Duke Senior, disguises herself as Ganymede

PERSONA.NAME: Celia
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Daughter to Duke Frederick, disguises herself as Aliena.

PERSONA.NAME: Phebe
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A shepherdess, falls in love with Ganymede, later marries Silvius.

PERSONA.NAME: Audrey
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A country wench

PERSONA.NAME: Lords
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Various lords

PERSONA.NAME: First Lord
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A lord

PERSONA.NAME: Second Lord
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A lord

PERSONA.NAME: First Page
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A page.

PERSONA.NAME: Second Page
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A page.

PERSONA.NAME: Foresters
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Various foresters.

PERSONA.NAME: Attendants
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Various attendants.
